articles.title: ‘Big decisions’ for Sharks to make on $1M star who’s ‘fired blanks since arriving’ - Fox Sports
articles.description: Cronulla won the game on Saturday night in Townsville but the club’s $1 million playmaker is once again in the gun.
articles.content:
Shaun Johnson had two try assists and 51 running metres in the 26-16 upset victory over the Cowboys.
But the performance seemingly has done nothing to convince rugby league great and Fox League anal… [+3972 chars]
